Package org.junit.platform.commons.logging

Class LoggerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.platform.commons.logging.LoggerFactory

  • @API(status=INTERNAL,
     since="1.0")
public final class LoggerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for the Logger facade for JUL.
    Since:
    1.0
